str.name: instruct1
str.val: To register your software and set up access to {0}Acrobat.com{1} online services, enter or create an Adobe ID.

str.name: instruct1NoServ
str.val: To register your software, enter or create an Adobe ID.

str.name: instructTrialLaunchServices
str.val: An Adobe ID is required to use this software as a trial and set up access to {0}Acrobat.com{1} online services during your trial period. You will have 7 days from the first launch of your trial to enter an Adobe ID.

str.name: instructTrialLaunchNo
str.val: An Adobe ID is required to use this software as a trial. You will have 7 days from the first launch of your trial to enter an Adobe ID.

str.name: createSub
str.val: Simply provide an email and password to create one.

str.name: accept
str.val: In order to take advantage of Acrobat.com services, you must provide an Adobe ID and agree to the applicable Terms of Use. If you do not provide an Adobe ID at this time, any applicable complimentary subscription period may be reduced.

str.name: errorEmail
str.val: Please enter the email address associated with your Adobe ID account.

str.name: errorMatch
str.val: Adobe ID and password do not match

str.name: instruct1
str.val: Creating an Adobe ID registers your software and sets up access to Acrobat.com online services. All fields are required.

str.name: instruct1NoServ
str.val: Creating an Adobe ID registers your software. All fields are required.

str.name: instructTrialLaunchServices
str.val: Creating an Adobe ID sets up access to Acrobat.com services during your trial period and lets us know of your interest in this product. All fields are required.

str.name: instructTrialLaunchNo
str.val: Creating an Adobe ID lets us know of your interest in this product. All fields are required.

str.name: opt
str.val: Please keep me informed about Adobe and its products and services, including product releases and upgrades, events, surveys, and offers. My data will be used by Adobe and its agents in accordance with {0}Adobe's online privacy policy{1}.

str.name: emailFormat
str.val: This is not a valid Email address.

str.name: errorDupe
str.val: This Adobe ID is already associated with another subscription. Please create a new Adobe ID or Sign in with a different Adobe ID.

str.name: germanOnly
str.val: I understand that, in accordance with its {0}Online Privacy Policy{1}, Adobe, its affiliates, and agents ("Adobe") will use the details I provide to update and manage its databases regarding customer and user preferences. I consent to Adobe's transferring my data to countries outside the EU where Adobe has operations, including the United States, for these purposes and for the additional purposes checked below. I understand that I may at any time change my preferences regarding the processing of my personal data by Adobe by visiting {2}my account page{3} or by contacting Adobe's Privacy Officer as set forth in {4}Adobe's Online Privacy Policy{5}. I understand that I may need to contact separately third parties who have received my personal data from Adobe prior to the communication of my preference changes.

str.name: tooLongError
str.val: This string is longer than maximum allowed. This must be 6 to 12 characters long.

str.name: tooShortError
str.val: This string is shorter than minimum allowed. This must be 6 to 12 characters long.

str.name: tooLongError
str.val: This string is longer than maximum allowed. This must be 6 to 12 characters long.

str.name: tooShortError
str.val: This string is shorter than minimum allowed. This must be 6 to 12 characters long.

str.name: tooLongError
str.val: This string is longer than maximum allowed. This must be 1 to 300 characters long.

str.name: tooShortError
str.val: This string is shorter than minimum allowed. This must be 1 to 300 characters long.

str.name: invalidCharError
str.val: Your e-mail address contains invalid characters.

str.name: invalidDomainError
str.val: The domain in your e-mail address is incorrectly formatted.

str.name: invalidIPDomainError
str.val: The IP domain in your e-mail address is incorrectly formatted.

str.name: invalidPeriodsInDomainError
str.val: The domain in your e-mail address has consecutive periods.

str.name: missingAtSignError
str.val: An at sign (@) is missing in your e-mail address.

str.name: missingPeriodInDomainError
str.val: The domain in your e-mail address is missing a period.

str.name: missingUsernameError
str.val: The username in your e-mail address is missing.

str.name: tooManyAtSignsError
str.val: Your e-mail address contains too many @ characters.

str.name: acceptTermsCBError
str.val: Please accept the terms and conditions.

str.name: invalidPassword
str.val: Your password must be between 6 and 12 characters and cannot contain consecutive spaces or colons.

str.name: invalidCharsInEmail
str.val: Your email address contains invalid characters.

str.name: invalidEmailFormat
str.val: This is not a valid email address.

str.name: acceptTermsCBError
str.val: Please accept the terms and conditions.

str.name: invalidEmailID
str.val: This is not a valid email address.

str.name: invalidPassword
str.val: Your password must be between 6 and 12 characters and cannot contain consecutive spaces or colons.

str.name: CUS05051
str.val: Adobe ID and password do not match.

str.name: UNKNOWN_ERROR
str.val: An error has occurred. Please try again after sometime.

str.name: ID_IN_USE
str.val: This email address has already been used.

str.name: TIMEOUT
str.val: Network error. Please try again later.

str.name: INVALID_ID
str.val: This is not a valid email address.
